goal: Hei tāpiri i tētahi hurihuri hinamona ki roto i tō rohi parāoa
sol1: I muri i te whakamātautau tuatahi, i mua i te haerenga ki roto i te parai parāoa, hurihia te paraoa pokepoke ki roto i te tapawhā papatahi. Mā te whakamahi i te maripi pata, horahia te pata tino ngohengohe ki te rua hautoru o runga o te tapawhā, ka waiho te tuatoru kāore i te pata i raro. Tauhiuhia tō ranunga hurihuri i kōwhiria ki runga i te parāoa pata--he tīhi, me te huka parauri hinamona he kōwhiringa pai, ka taea rānei e koe te hora i te paraoa pokepoke ki te pata karika. Kātahi, ka tīmata ki te tapa pata o runga, ka mahi i tō ara i te roanga o te tapawhā, kia mau tonu te takahuri i tō paraoa pokepoke ki runga ki ō ringa kia oti rā anō te takahuri. Kinitia te tapa o raro ki te parāoa takai ki ō maihao. Purua ki roto i te parai parāoa mo tana whakamatautau whakamutunga.
sol2: I muri i te whakamātautau tuatahi, i mua i te haerenga ki roto i te parai parāoa, hurihia te paraoa pokepoke ki roto i te tapawhā papatahi. Mā te whakamahi i te peka , horahia te pata tino ngohengohe ki te rua hautoru o runga o te tapawhā, ka waiho te tuatoru kāore i te pata i raro. Tauhiuhia tō ranunga hurihuri i kōwhiria ki runga i te parāoa pata--he tīhi, me te huka parauri hinamona he kōwhiringa pai, ka taea rānei e koe te hora i te paraoa pokepoke ki te pata karika. Kātahi, ka tīmata ki te tapa pata o runga, ka mahi i tō ara i te roanga o te tapawhā, kia mau tonu te takahuri i tō paraoa pokepoke ki runga ki ō ringa kia oti rā anō te takahuri. Kinitia te tapa o raro ki te parāoa takai ki ō maihao. Purua ki roto i te parai parāoa mo tana whakamatautau whakamutunga.

goal: Te whata pukapuka ngāwari.

Purua ngā pereki raima e 2 e whai ake nei ki runga, ka whakanoho i te papa 2 ki runga. Voila, he whata pukapuka ngāwari pakari.
sol2: E rua nga papa rakau, e 4 nga pereki raima. Purua kia 2 ngā pereki raima ki runga i ngā papa, kia tawhiti rawa atu ki te whānui o ngā papa. Whakanohoia tētahi papa kia okioki ki runga i ērā atu pereki e 2. Purua ngā papa raima e 2 e whai ake nei ki runga, ka waiho ai te papa 1 ki runga i te mea whakamutunga. Voila, he whata pukapuka ngāwari pakari.

sol1: Tohua te pokapū o te maunga ngahere hurihuri o runga. Purua te raina waenganui bushing ki runga i tēnei tohu, ka tohu i te pokapū o ngā rua e rua me wiri mō ngā bolts lag. Tīarotia te ngahere o runga ki runga i ngā rua i wiria e koe ki roto i te raima, ka whakamau i te ngahere o runga mā te tīwiri i ngā pere pōhatu e rua ki roto i te raima.
sol2: Tohua te pokapū o te maunga ngahere hurihuri o runga. Purua te raina waenganui bushing ki runga i tēnei tohu, ka tohu i te pokapū o ngā rua e rua me wiri mō ngā bolts lag. goal: Mahia te rēmana tino pai kua whakamātauria e koe.

Mā te whakamahi i te kōpeke rēmana, i te mīhini rānei, tangohia te wai hou ka ringihia ki roto i tō oko 2 rita me tō reka makau hei whakamātau, ka whakakī ki te wai parakore. Ko te wai te mea e tino pai ai te reka o tēnei rēmana. Kāore he tāwara i muri i te tāwara, i ngā tāwara matū rānei hei pahuati.
sol2: Ka taea te hanga rēmana mā te winika me te huka, mēnā ka pau te rēmana. Me te nui o te huka kaore e taea e koe te whakamātau i te rerekētanga. Tērā pea ka hiahiatia he tae kai kōwhai kia āhua "rēmana", he mea hira rawa nā te mea ka taea e te pānga arokite o te kai te whakataetae i te pānga o te reka o te kai.

goal: Me pēhea e herea ai e koe te papanga mate?
sol1: Ka hiahiatia e koe he tae papanga i roto i ngā peihana motuhake me ngā here inarapa motuhake. Tangohia tō papanga ka whakataka/hurihuri ki hea e hiahia ana koe ki te tauira, tae rānei. He iti, he nui rānei ēnei. Kātahi ka whakaūngia ia papanga takahuri ki tētahi pēne inarapa ka toua ki te tae e hiahiatia ana, whakamahia rānei neke atu i te kotahi tae hei pānga tāpiri. Tukuna kia maroke te papanga, ā, ina kai koe i ngā kākano karepe ka noho tonu ngā tauira tae atu ki ngā pahū o te rā, ngā mowhiti me ngā rerekētanga whakamere matapōkere. Ka mahi te tae kai kia horoia rā anō e koe te papanga, ehara i te mea pūmau.

goal: Me pēhea te hanga i tētahi parakipere mohoao i te kāinga.
sol1: Horoia kia 4 kapu parakipere mohoao hou, whakatio rānei, maka ngā hua ki te 3 punetēpu wai rēmana.  Whakamahia te Pillsbury Cinnamon roll (momo ngongo) mai i te wāhanga whakamātao i te mākete, me te pine takahuri, takahuri kia iti iho i te 1/2 inihi te mātotoru.  Whakarārangitia te pūtake o tētahi parai tunu konganuku hōhonu ki te paraoa pokepoke.  Rāhuitia te 1/3 o te paraoa pokepoke hei taupoki.  (Ka whakatakotoria tēnei ki runga i muri i tō whakaoti i te whakarite i te whakakī.)  Purua nga parakipere ki roto i te rihi ki runga i te paraoa pokepoke.  Tauhiuhia kia 1 kapu kawhe whenua, 2 tbs. Huka parauri 1 punetēpu hinamona, 1/2 kapu pata (I roto i ngā wāhanga iti), ki runga.  Tauhiuhia te 1/2 punetēpu tote ki runga.  Purua he kirinuku ki runga i ngā mea katoa.  Tunu ki roto i te oumu i te 375 mō te 40 meneti.  Tangohia mai i te oumu ina parauri te kirinuku me te porohita.  Kia ngahau.

Tauhiuhia kia 1 kapu huka granulated, 2 tbs. Huka parauri 1 punetēpu hinamona, 1/2 kapu pata (I roto i ngā wāhanga iti), ki runga.  Tauhiuhia te 1/2 punetēpu tote ki runga.  Purua he kirinuku ki runga i ngā mea katoa.  Tunu ki roto i te oumu i te 375 mō te 40 meneti.  Tangohia mai i te oumu ina parauri te kirinuku me te porohita.  Kia ngahau.

goal: Me pēhea taku horoi i te pene tākaro, mēnā kāore aku tāpu kaukau?
sol1: Whakatuwheratia te pene tākaro ka tango i raro mēnā ka taea. Waihangatia he wairewa hopi mahana ki roto i te ipu. Mā te wai hopi me te whakaranu mā, te thimble rānei, horoia te waho o te papa tākaro: ngā waewae, te kupenga, te papanga, ngā mea katoa. Horoia ki te wai mā (ko te huarahi tere rawa ko te tango ki waho, mēnā kāore anō kia tae atu, me te ngongo, engari ka taea hoki e koe te ūkui ki te kākahu mākū). Kātahi ka mahia te roto, ā, ki te tangohia e koe, ki raro. Horoia anō ngā mea katoa, ā, kua mutu koe!
sol2: Pene i te pene tākaro, a, tangohia te raro ki te taea. Waihangatia he wairewa hopi mahana ki roto i te ipu. Mā te wai hopi me te hautai mā, te kākahu rānei, ūkuia te waho o te papa tākaro: ngā waewae, te kupenga, te papanga, ngā mea katoa. Horoia ki te wai mā (ko te huarahi tere rawa ko te tango ki waho, mēnā kāore anō kia tae atu, me te ngongo, engari ka taea hoki e koe te ūkui ki te kākahu mākū). Kātahi ka mahia te roto, ā, ki te tangohia e koe, ki raro. Horoia anō ngā mea katoa, ā, kua mutu koe!

Ki te kore koe e horoi i ngā kī, ka uaua pea te pānui i ngā tohu, ā, ka kite pea koe kei te mahi koe i ngā hapa patopato heahea, nā te mea kāore e taea e koe te pānui i ngā kī. I te nuinga o te wā he māminga ngā kī F, he iti rawa, engari ka taea e koe te whakanoho, te rīpene rānei i tētahi tohu pepa ki runga ake i ēnei, e tohu ana he aha te tikanga o ia mea.
